mapper.insert: insert into visit_statistics (visit_id, visit_date, visit_online_max, visit_current_day, visit_total_count) values (#{visitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitOnlineMax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitCurrentDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitTotalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select visit_id, visit_date, visit_online_max, visit_current_day, visit_total_count from visit_statistics
